notes.text:
An updated python-glanceclient package that fixes one security issue is now
available for Red Hat OpenStack 3.0.

The Red Hat Security Response Team has rated this update as having moderate
security impact. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score,
which gives a detailed severity rating, is available from the CVE link in
the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The python-glanceclient package provides a client for the OpenStack Glance
API.

It was discovered that the Python Glance client did not properly check
SSL certificates. An attacker could use this flaw to conduct
man-in-the-middle attacks. (CVE-2013-4111)

Red Hat would like to thank the OpenStack project for reporting this issue.
Upstream acknowledges Thomas Leaman of HP as the original reporter.

All users of python-glanceclient are advised to upgrade to this updated
package, which corrects this issue.
notes.title: Details

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: python-glanceclient security update

branches.name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform 3.0

product.name: Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform 3.0

full_product_name.name: python-glanceclient-1:0.9.0-2.el6ost.noarch as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform 3.0
python-glanceclient-1:0.9.0-2.el6ost.src as a component of Red Hat Enterprise Linux OpenStack Platform 3.0

notes.text: The Python client library for Glance (python-glanceclient) before 0.10.0 does not properly check the preverify_ok value, which prevents the server hostname from being verified with a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) or subjectAltName field of the X.509 certificate and allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL servers via an arbitrary valid certificate.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: OpenStack: python-glanceclient failing SSL certificate check
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

This update is available via the Red Hat Network. Details on how to
use the Red Hat Network to apply this update are available at
https://access.redhat.com/site/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: OpenStack: python-glanceclient failing SSL certificate check
